page.title: 19A RURAL PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: We only have 17 children in school now.We have a headmaster and a part-time infant teacher.Our school has two rooms which can be made into one.A cook makes our dinners each day. We have meat,fish,vegetables,fruit and cake.A lady comes to clean up each day We start at 9.00 with an assembly.In the morning we do work in different subjects.Sometimes we work by ourselves and sometimes in small groups.We have stories.use the computer ,listen to the radio and watch special television programmes. We can use different materials for art and craft work and can use sewing machines and make things woth clay. We often do work about the outdoors and have a good area around us. We enjoy physical activities and sometimes meet other children to share in our work and play.We go pn visits.
